thread.section_title: MicksGarage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MicksGarage.com | www.micksgarage.com
thread.title: Crafton Williams

author: Crafton Williams
title: Crafton Williams
text:
I've been searching UK online parts dealers for many weeks, trying to find for my Honda Accord 2.0i ES, 1996 Automatic (UK Model) a
Left Headlight (Part #33153-SN7-E02),
Left Indicator White with Lamp Base (Part #33352-SN7-G02) and a
Right Indicator White with Lamp Base (Part #33302-SN7-G02).
(My Chassis #SHHCE86700U008052, Engine #F20Z1-E31146).
Some of the sites were simply difficult to navigate and contact could not be made, others were reachable, didn't have the items in stock and their customer-service staff were very unfriendly, unreliable and unprofessional.
By chance,I came across an advertisement on the Amazon UK website for MicksGarage. I decided to send them an email about the said parts and within a short while I received a very welcoming reply from Mikey who asked me for additional info about my car. He then passed my request to the relevant department and within an hour, I received a very interesting and unusual email from Ciaran Duggan.
Ciaran expressed regret for not having my items in stock and went further by recommending three online companies that may have them. This was a very caring gesture which I found to be most helpful. I have since written to the companies and am awaiting their response.
I shall certainly call on Micks Garage again, as well as, refer my relatives, friends and colleagues in the U.K. and in Jamaica.
Keep up the good work and many thanks for going the extra mile for me.
Kindest regards.
Crafton Williams
Williams Guest Houses
Kingston 6, Jamaica
williamshotelsjm
Tel.876-328 4094
